version_description:
We've worked on some bugs, now the reset button works as it should and all your characters stay in place!

It’s Winter Holiday in Toca Life: School and we brought in some celebratory items to spread the holiday cheer! What’s new then?
- We’ve changed the icon!
- We added a new fun holiday character!
- Wear winter holiday costumes and play with new items on the same theme
- We added markers in different colors
- You can now chew gum!
- Check out the new names on the scientist t-shirt

Happy Holidays!
We cleared out the Winter Holidays and changed the icon!

Here’s what we updated in this version:

- We improved the food stacking system and tweaked some things.
- The “Yes? No!” T-shirt bug is all sorted out. Enjoy all the clothes again!
- All the characters in the sidewalk stay where they should. No more missing people!
- We added a mini-location. Say hi to your new storage! Here you can put away seasonal clothes and store old items. You can also find boxes to suit your packing needs!

Continue to send us awesome suggestions and share your Life adventures on Instagram and YouTube with #TocaLifeSchool

Thanks for playing! We’ve made some changes including:
● Turn day to night and night to day.
● Wear masks on top of masks!
● Improved food stacking system.
● Organized characters in the sidewalk.

Do you like playing with Toca Life: School? Leave us a review — we read everyone of them!
Are you having issues or simply want to tell us about something cool you’ve discovered? Visit tocaboca.com/help or talk to us on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter and YouTube. We’re @tocaboca!

• Life Weekly got a makeover and is now Toca Life MIX! Your source for everything happening in Toca Life. Check out the latest news, watch cool videos and vote in fun polls.
